Title: TFS Work Item Tracking Custom Controls
Description: The application will provide a number of custom controls for the Visual Studio Team System Work Item Tracking component.
HomeWiki:
The application will provide a number of custom controls for the Visual Studio Team System Work Item Tracking component.

All these custom control will be written using Windows Presentation Framework isteam of the usual Windows Forms.

The first control will be a Sign Off controll to allow users to Sign Off on requirements at the click of a button.

Controls List

  • SignOff - Allows only the loged in users name to be used to sign of a work item. Fills out the users name.
